backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, photo metadata, blob storage, and an admin‑gated build deployment system with draft and production promotion logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the promotion of draft build 140, including related files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PROMOTION.md: Guide explaining how to promote draft build version 140 to production using backend admin methods.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_STATUS.md: Status document tracking deployment history, showing draft version 140 pending promotion and listing included features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that preloads splash media, loads Font Awesome, and mounts the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration and page routes for splash, onboarding, home, camera, vault, and settings flows.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDeleteMod: Reusable modal component for confirming deletion actions with backdrop, title, message, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/EmojiFloatOverla: Component generating animated floating emojis with staggered motion and reduced‑motion accessibility support.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Empty file with no implemented component content.
frontend/src/components/HomeWeeklyCalend: Weekly calendar strip component with week navigation, date selection, and color indicators for dates with moments.
frontend/src/components/InlineToast.tsx: Transient toast notification component with fade animations, configurable placement, and success/warning styles.
frontend/src/components/MomentsImageCard: Displays a moment photo with user info, timestamp, metadata, and optional emotion, reflection, and who details.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPopu: Small popup bubble showing a notification message with avatar and dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/PlannedMomentBot: Bottom sheet for creating or editing planned moments with time, date, title input, and animated open/close behavior.
frontend/src/components/PlannedMomentCar: Card displaying a planned moment’s date, title, time, color marker, and share/delete actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity and resets dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoGeolocation.ts: Hook that requests geolocation once per session and returns coordinates via callback when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackSlideNavigatio: Hook providing slide-back exit animation state and a handler that triggers navigation after the animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGentleAutoScroll.t: Provides continuous upward auto-scrolling with pause on user interaction and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login flow, stored identity loading, and context exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Uses IntersectionObserver to report when an element enters the viewport, optionally only once.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalNotifications: Loads, tracks, and updates local notifications with unread counts and storage subscriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMomentsPhotos.ts: Loads stored moments photos and updates when storage or custom events change.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPopups: Shows popup notifications for new local notifications and auto-dismisses them after a timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlannedMoments.ts: Manages planned moments data, including date filtering, storage syncing, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Handles user profile loading, updates, and auto-geolocation when missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeGesture.ts: Detects horizontal swipe gestures and triggers callbacks with optional scroll prevention.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, light/dark mode design tokens, and custom UI classes including glassmorphic cards and calendar strip styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Implements a weekly calendar view with date selection, planned/photo moment indicators, and a bottom sheet for moment actions.
frontend/src/pages/CameraScreen.tsx: Provides camera capture functionality with photo preview, retake, upload, and draft saving before navigating to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Renders the home dashboard with weekly calendar, planned moments, navigation actions, and notification handling.
frontend/src/pages/MobileSplashScreen.ts: Displays an animated multi-card mobile splash screen with auto-play transitions and login integration.
frontend/src/pages/MomentFeelingCheckPag: Lets users select a feeling for a saved moment, updates storage, triggers first-time notifications, and navigates to the moment’s vault page.
frontend/src/pages/MomentsPage.tsx: File is empty or not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays local notifications with read/unread state, supports marking as read, and navigates back with slide animation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows editing profile details, updating profile storage, handling avatar uploads, and triggering a first-save notification.
frontend/src/pages/SaveMomentConfirmPage: Confirms saving a captured photo or video as a moment, stores metadata, and routes to the feeling check step.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows settings options, supports logout via Internet Identity, and uses slide-back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/VaultMomentPage.tsx: Displays a single moment with swipe navigation, metadata overlays, and exit animations.
frontend/src/pages/VaultPage.tsx: Shows grouped moments in a grid with lazy loading, delete actions, and first‑visit notification handling.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Renders the animated welcome screen and navigates to the home page on start.
frontend/src/utils/localNotificationsSto: Manages local notification storage, trigger tracking, and event updates for personalized user notifications.
frontend/src/utils/momentFeelings.ts: Defines feeling options and helpers for retrieving feeling emojis, labels, and metadata.
Handles local storage for moment photos, including saving, updating, loading, and triggering first‑photo notifications.
frontend/src/utils/pendingMomentDraftSto: Provides session-based storage for moment drafts, confirmations, and temporary saved IDs.
frontend/src/utils/plannedMomentShareTex: Generates shareable text for a planned moment by formatting its date, time, and optional display name.
frontend/src/utils/plannedMomentsStorage: Provides localStorage CRUD for planned moments with one-per-day enforcement, color assignment, events, and notifications.
frontend/src/utils/profileStorage.ts: Manages user profile storage in localStorage with automatic invite code creation and update events.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into short relative time strings or fallback date formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive values from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, OKLCH-based color system, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes overall project state, features, and architecture metadata for the Moments app.
